bibl.title: The Place in Late Antique Alexandria 'Where Alchemists and Scholars Sit (...) Was Like Stairs'.

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VIII

bibl.note: Late antique city plan. - Christianization of the cityscape. - Location of academic life in the city. - Memories of Kom el-Dikka in the Arab tradition.

bibl.title: Alexandria. Auditoria of Kom el-Dikka and Late Antique Education

bibl.seg: McKENZIE Judith S., The Place in Late Antique Alexandria 'Where Alchemists and Scholars Sit (...) Was Like Stairs'.

Tomasz DERDA, Tomasz MARKIEWICZ and Ewa WIPSZYCKA (Edd.), Alexandria. Auditoria of Kom el-Dikka and Late Antique Education = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VIII (Warsaw, 2007) pp. 53-83, 5 figg. n./bl., 7 figg. coul., 5 plans.
